name: Archfiend of Ifnir
resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The archfiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The archfiend uses Horror Nimbus if it can. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 32 (5d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Horror Nimbus (Recharge 5-6)
text: The archfiend magically emits scintillating, multicolored light. Each creature within 15 feet of the archfiend that can see the light must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archfiend's Horror Nimbus for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Teleport
text: The archfiend magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
